trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SEQ_00<tab>Amh Garanjy could use some help from an adventurer. ※ This quest is available for a limited time only.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SEQ_01<tab>Strolling through the Starlight Celebration festivities in Gridania, you encounter Amh Garanjy, enthusiastic Starlight celebrant. With grand plans to provide kinderpunsch, a kind of mulled punch, to festivalgoers, Amh Garanjy entreats your aid in the preparations. Thankful for your willing assent, she bids you join her at the Starlight Stalls, which you may travel to by speaking with the Starlight Stalls guide at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre.
※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SEQ_02<tab>You have arrived at the Starlight Stalls, located on Gridania's outskirts, where you catch sight of Amh Garanjy. You make your way over to her to hear further details on the planned punch.
※In the event that you leave the Starlight Stalls, you may return by speaking with the Starlight Stalls guide at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SEQ_03<tab>Speaking with Amh Garanjy and Mother Miounne, you learn of the plan to create three separate types of kinderpunsch to represent Gridania, Limsa Lominsa, and Ul'dah─each to be served in an appropriately decorated festive mug. Miounne is still unsure of the best blends to encapsulate the other cities, but there are doubtless some experts on regional cuisine among the visitors to the Gridanian markets. You keep an eye out for anyone who may be able to furnish you with advice and inspiration for the mulled punch recipes.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SEQ_04<tab>You have acquired some useful pointers from several visitors to Gridania. Eager to share your findings with Amh Garanjy, you make your way back to Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SEQ_05<tab>Brimming with inspiration, Amh Garanjy sets about making arrangements to procure the required ingredients. In the meantime, she bids you speak to the children visiting the Starlight Stalls and inform them of the upcoming kinderpunsch on offer. She suggests you take note of any preferences they express, to better recommend a refreshment to their tastes.
※You may travel to the Starlight Stalls by speaking with the guide at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SEQ_06<tab>The children are now suitably informed and enthused. Your task accomplished, you go to seek out the saturnine Starlight celebrant in order to assist in serving the kinderpunsch.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SEQ_07<tab>All the children have been furnished with beverages and are pleased as punch. At the encouragement of the saturnine Starlight celebrant, who steps in to relieve you of your duties, you return to Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre to inform Amh Garanjy of the success at the stalls.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SEQ_08<tab>While all the children enjoyed their drinks, it seems that Joultain─a young boy with a strong wanderlust─is particularly replete with festive cheer, thanks to the help of a certain adventurer. If, inspired by the spirit of Starlight, you wish to assist with the punch stall once more, you may speak to the saturnine Starlight celebrant at the Starlight Stalls.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Starlight Stalls guide.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Amh Garanjy at the Starlight Stalls.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_TODO_02<tab>Speak with visitors to Gridania near the markets.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Amh Garanjy.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_TODO_04<tab>Speak with children visiting the Starlight Stalls.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_TODO_05<tab>Speak with the saturnine Starlight celebrant.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Amh Garanjy at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_XMXMARKETWARP_000_001<tab>Apologies, the stalls are overcrowded at present. I'd be happy to show you there once the number of attendees has eased.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_002<tab>Happy Starlight, adventurer! I am Amh Garanjy, Starlight celebrant. And you are called <var 29 EB02 /var>, you say? 'Tis a pleasure to make your acquaintance! Might this be your first time partaking in the festivities?

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_003<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! What a pleasure it is to see you again in this most festive of seasons. Allow me to reiterate my thanks for your contributions to Starlights past!

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_004<tab>Inspired by an old Ishgardian tale, the Starlight Celebration is about granting the wishes of children. And this year, we are bringing back the festive market that offers joy and merriment to young and old alike: the Starlight Stalls!

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_005<tab>The first time around, the Carline Canopy supplied us with kinderpunsch, a kind of mulled punch, which we provided to guests. It proved tremendously popular, so we are planning to provide it again─with a twist!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_006<tab>Alas, with all the celebrants busy attending to the preparation at the stalls, we haven't been able to get working on said twist...
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_100_006<tab>If you are not otherwise occupied, might you be willing to lend us a hand?
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_007<tab>I am truly grateful! Without further ado, please join me at the Carline Canopy stall at the market. There, I shall explain the particulars to you.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_008<tab>When you are ready, the guide yonder will be glad to escort you through. I shall see you anon!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_XMXMARKETWARP_000_010<tab>Ah, so you are the adventurer who has agreed to help us! If you would follow me, I shall take you to the Starlight Stalls.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>Head to the Starlight Stalls?
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_MARKETSHOP05231_000_021<tab>We're currently preparing our new product range. Please come back later!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_020<tab>My thanks again for assisting us. I've asked Miounne to join me in explaining our punch plans. She should be along any moment now.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_MIOUNNE_000_030<tab>Ah, so you're the adventurer who's been roped in to help.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_MIOUNNE_000_031<tab>An excellent choice, given the fine work you did distributing the punch last festival. It was a favorite among attendees, and the mugs had the desired effect of promoting the Carline Canopy.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_MIOUNNE_000_032<tab>As Amh may have mentioned, at last year's festival, the Carline Canopy prepared kinderpunsch for the people. This was distributed in mugs with a Gridanian design.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_MIOUNNE_000_033<tab>When I mentioned this to my guild counterparts in the other city-states, they were keen to have their homes represented on the mugs as well. And so we had these beauties made.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_034<tab>To be deleted.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_MIOUNNE_100_034<tab>They bear local vistas and motifs, such as a galleon for Limsa Lominsa and a cactuar for Ul'dah, with seasonal flourishes worked in for the festive touch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_MIOUNNE_000_035<tab>To be deleted.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_100_035<tab>Since we have now three lovely mugs, we thought it would be fitting to serve up three varieties of kinderpunsch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_MIOUNNE_000_036<tab>In Gridania, punch is traditionally made by simmering the juice of locally grown apples with blood currants, cinnamon, and various herbs.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_MIOUNNE_000_037<tab>For the Lominsan and Ul'dahn varieties, I'm keen to incorporate ingredients found in their respective locales, but I haven't been able to decide on what...
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_038<tab>And therein lies our request!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_JOULTAIN_000_039<tab>(-Lively Youth-)Hello! Could we get some mulled punch, please?
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_JOULTAIN_000_040<tab>(-Lively Youth-)Whoa, new mug designs!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_JOULTAIN_000_041<tab>(-Lively Youth-)Are the pictures of other cities? I wonder what they're like!

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_042<tab>Ah, young Joultain! The punch isn't ready yet, but it shan't be long now. We are currently preparing two new varieties, you see, using ingredients from the cities shown on these mugs.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_043<tab>Hehe, it does me well to see the younglings' curiosity for faraway lands.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_044<tab>It further motivates me to serve up kinderpunsch that will not disappoint─which brings me back to the task we have for you.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_100_044<tab>We ask that you investigate what ingredients we should use to create punch that best captures each nation.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_110_044<tab>Gridania's market attracts many visitors from the realm over. An adventurer such as yourself should have no trouble identifying suitable individuals─and coaxing out the relevant information.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_046<tab>Your confidence is most assuring! I shall apprise the other celebrants of the situation, and then return to Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre. I look forward to your findings!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_JOULTAIN_000_060<tab>So you're an adventurer? That's so amazing!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_061<tab>My thanks again for your kind assistance. I look forward to hearing what ingredients are suggested for our new varieties of kinderpunsch!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_LOMINSANCHEF05231_000_070<tab>You want to make punch with a Lominsan twist? Then you'll want to use plenty of La Noscean oranges, lowland grapes, and lemons.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_LOMINSANCHEF05231_000_071<tab>La Noscean citrus is renowned far and wide. It's featured heavily in Lominsan cuisine ever since sailors started using it to ward off scurvy, and I always ensure that our restaurant has ample stock.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_LOMINSANCHEF05231_000_072<tab>I'm in charge of procurement at the Bismarck, you see. If you're after quality citrus, I'd be glad to introduce you to our suppliers!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_LOMINSANCHEF05231_100_072<tab>If you're making punch with a Lominsan twist, I guarantee you can't go wrong with La Noscean citrus!

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_ULDAHNLADY05231_000_073<tab>What's that? Ingredients that are distinctly Ul'dahn? Well, most of my countrymen would say nopal and spices...but that would be selling our cuisine short, for dining should be an <var 1A 02 /var>adventure<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_ULDAHNLADY05231_000_074<tab>The thrill of the unknown... The triumph of audacity... A dish should have all the drama of a championship bout at the Coliseum, oh yes!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_ULDAHNLADY05231_000_075<tab>Such an experience may be a little stimulating for children, but we grown-ups can appreciate a little excitement. Wouldn't you agree?

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_ULDAHNMERCHANT05231_000_076<tab>You wish to make a drink that represents Ul'dah? Tea would be a good place to start. We Ul'dahns can't get through the day without a good, strong brew!

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_ULDAHNMERCHANT05231_000_077<tab>It's served up anywhere you can get a feed─doesn't matter if it's a slap-up meal or just a sweet treat. I've heard tell that the sultana takes hers with generous helpings of butter and honey.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_ULDAHNMERCHANT05231_000_078<tab>Aside from tea, Thanalan has specialties like vanilla, cloves, black pepper, and pearl ginger. The finest stuff can cost as much as gemstones.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_ULDAHNMERCHANT05231_100_078<tab>If you're making a drink that represents Ul'dah, it needs to have tea in it. Butter and spice would make good accents too!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_079<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Were you able to learn anything promising?
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_080<tab>Oh, those ingredients seem representative of Limsa Lominsa and Ul'dah indeed! We celebrants should be able to procure the items, so pray leave it to us!

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_081<tab>Once the kinderpunsch has been prepared, we would be pleased if you would do the honors and serve it. When it is time, please present yourself to my colleague at the Starlight Stalls.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_082<tab>And if you happen to have a moment now, might I trouble you to speak with the little ones from earlier?

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_083<tab>I am hoping that you could learn which city holds the greatest interest for each of them. In so doing, you would be able to recommend varieties of punch that would be the most meaningful.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_084<tab>To be deleted.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_090<tab>Please find the little ones and learn what city holds the greatest interest for each of them. And when it is time to distribute the punch, my colleague at the Starlight Stalls will assist you.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_COMMITTEE05231_000_091<tab>Rest assured our preparations are proceeding apace. One enthusiastic young man even offered to help.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231A_000_100<tab>The punch is almost ready? I can't wait to have some!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231A_000_101<tab>What do I like to eat? Hmmm...fruits! We have apples and berries here in the wood, but I'd love to try fruits from other places too.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231B_000_102<tab>They're giving out hot drinks...? That sounds great!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231B_000_103<tab>Um...I'm visiting with my mum. It's my first time in Gridania...so I guess I want to learn more about everything here.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_JOULTAIN_000_104<tab>Oh, you're the adventurer from before! The mulled punch is almost ready? Hooray!

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_JOULTAIN_000_105<tab>I want to learn about all new places, so it's hard to decide on a punch. There's no ocean in Gridania, so it's my dream to go sailing everywhere on a big ship!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231A_000_110<tab>I'll head over soon! I can't wait to see what kinds of punch there'll be. Something with fruits from other places, I hope!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231B_000_111<tab>It's my first time in Gridania...so I guess I want to learn more about everything here.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_JOULTAIN_000_112<tab>I want to learn about all new places. One day, I'll go sailing everywhere on a big ship!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_COMMITTEE05231_000_120<tab>Ah, excellent timing. We've received the last of the ingredients and are now brewing the new varieties of kinderpunsch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_COMMITTEE05231_000_121<tab>We expect a throng of children will descend upon us as soon as we begin serving. Are you ready to attend to them?
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_Q2_000_000<tab>Are you ready to serve the punch?
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A2_000_001<tab>I'm ready!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A2_000_002<tab>I'd like to review the characteristics of the cities and their punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A2_000_003<tab>Not just yet...
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SYSTEM_000_123<tab>The following event cannot be skipped. You may wish to cancel any pending Duty Finder registrations.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SYSTEM_000_124<tab>Start serving the punch?

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_COMMITTEE05231_000_125<tab>Gridania is located in the Black Shroud, the dominion of the elementals. The Carline Canopy's kinderpunsch uses generous amounts of apple and cinnamon, and is a veritable bounty of the forest.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_COMMITTEE05231_000_126<tab>Limsa Lominsa is a culinary cradle, where myriad cultures have come together courtesy of trade on the seas.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_COMMITTEE05231_000_127<tab>The Lominsan kinderpunsch blends foreign spices with La Noscean citruses, to produce a fusion of flavor that reflects the mingling of peoples in the city.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_COMMITTEE05231_000_128<tab>Ruled by the sultana Nanamo Ul Namo, the nation of Ul'dah thrives on commerce. Its bazaars are lined with exotic wares brought in by caravans, while the Coliseum throngs with nobles who seek the thrill of gladiatorial combat.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_COMMITTEE05231_000_129<tab>The Ul'dahn kinderpunsch is made by simmering dried fruits and black pepper in a sweet butter tea. The result is a flavor that is royally rich as well as stimulating.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231C_000_130<tab>A friend of mine used to live in Ul'dah, and he tells me stories about it. I've always wanted to know what it's like there...if you have something like that?
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you serve?
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A3_000_001<tab>Gridanian punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A3_000_002<tab>Lominsan punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A3_000_003<tab>Ul'dahn punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231C_000_132<tab>Wow, this is really good, like a sweet tea with spices! Is this what Ul'dah smells like, I wonder... I'm going to get my friend to come too!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231C_000_133<tab>Wow, this is really good! But...is the flavor really Ul'dahn? I'm going to get my friend and ask him about it!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231A_000_134<tab>I'd love to see what fruits from other places taste like. Do you have a punch that's made with them?
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_Q4_000_000<tab>What will you serve?
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A4_000_001<tab>Gridanian punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A4_000_002<tab>Lominsan punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A4_000_003<tab>Ul'dahn punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231A_000_136<tab>Oh, it's sour, but sweet! I love it! I had no idea they grew so many kinds of citruses in La Noscea.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231A_000_137<tab>This is a bit different, but it's still very nice! There's also a stall nearby selling orange juice, so I'll go and try some later.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231D_100_137<tab>You here for punch too? Come on, let's go up together!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231B_110_137<tab>A-Alright!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231D_000_138<tab>I heard there's a place called the Coliseum where gladiators fight each other. I want a punch that'll make me feel like I'm there!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_Q5_000_000<tab>What will you serve?
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A5_000_001<tab>Gridanian punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A5_000_002<tab>Lominsan punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A5_000_003<tab>Ul'dahn punch.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231D_000_140<tab>So the Coliseum is in Ul'dah? I'd love to see a fight there one day...but right now there's a fight in my own mouth! Whew, the spices in this punch sure pack a punch!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231D_000_141<tab>Ahhh, the spices in the punch are firing me up! I have to go and train─right now!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231B_000_142<tab>Um...hello again. I've never had mulled punch before. I'm not sure which one I should try...
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_Q6_000_000<tab>What will you serve?
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A6_000_001<tab>Gridanian punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A6_000_002<tab>Lominsan punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A6_000_003<tab>Ul'dahn punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231B_000_144<tab>Thank you! I love the apple flavor, and the mug is beautiful too! Oh, I hope I can meet some moogles while I'm in Gridania!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231B_000_145<tab>It's warm and delicious, thank you! It's been really fun here at the stalls. I'm going to keep exploring!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_JOULTAIN_000_146<tab>Hmmm, what to choose... I suppose I'd like a punch that makes me feel like I'm sailing somewhere far away!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_Q7_000_000<tab>What will you serve?
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A7_000_001<tab>Gridanian punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A7_000_002<tab>Lominsan punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A7_000_003<tab>Ul'dahn punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_JOULTAIN_000_148<tab>Wow, what a great blend of flavors! And I just love the design on the mug. It's ships like this that connect the whole world!

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_JOULTAIN_000_149<tab>Wow, what a great blend of flavors! That reminds me, the merchants at the markets also sell wares from faraway places. I should take a closer look at them next time!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_JOULTAIN_000_150<tab>Thank you, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>! I've had a lot of fun!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_COMMITTEE05231_000_151<tab>It seems the children really enjoyed their punch. You did well indeed with your selections.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_COMMITTEE05231_000_152<tab>Well, that appears to be all of the children for now. Our thanks for helping them to enjoy their punch.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_COMMITTEE05231_000_153<tab>From hereon, we celebrants will tend to the punch distribution with your fine example as a guide. You need only report back to Amh Garanjy─she will be eager to know how we fare.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_COMMITTEE05231_000_160<tab>Please leave the rest of the distribution to us, and report back to Amh Garanjy. She will be eager to know how we fare.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_MIOUNNE_000_170<tab>I've just finished putting out a few proverbial fires at the guild, so I thought I'd come by and see how you were getting on.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_171<tab>The more the merrier, as I always say! And if you're here, my friend, may I assume that the kinderpunsch has been handed out to the little ones as planned?
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_172<tab>We are truly in your debt. With your help, we have not only brought the children festive cheer, but also expanded their horizons.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_MIOUNNE_000_173<tab>Of course, they're all more than welcome to return and try the other types of punch. The longer they enjoy themselves at the stalls, the better.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_JOULTAIN_000_174<tab>There you are, adventurer! I wanted to thank you again─and Miss Garanjy and Miounne too!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_175<tab>It was absolutely our pleasure. If you enjoyed the punch, then nothing would please us more.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_JOULTAIN_000_176<tab>When I grow up, I want to be someone who knows lots about the world like you, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>! I'll go and see what's out there for myself, and tell everyone all about it.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_JOULTAIN_000_177<tab>And I want to tell everyone about Gridania too. The Starlight Stalls have reminded me just how much I love it here!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_178<tab>That is a wonderful wish, and I've no doubt that the Spinner Herself has heard it!

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_MIOUNNE_000_179<tab>When the time comes, it'll be my pleasure to register you as an adventurer, young man. And I'll look forward to hearing your tales of courage and high adventure.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_MIOUNNE_000_180<tab>That goes for you as well, of course.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_181<tab>It seems you've truly inspired young Joultain. And should you still have time to spare, you could potentially inspire even more souls─by helping us serve up more kinderpunsch!

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_182<tab>We'd also be glad if you simply enjoyed the festivities hereon─it is entirely up to you. While the celebration continues, our guide will be pleased to show you to the stalls. My thanks again, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and happy Starlight!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SYSTEM_000_185<tab>The vendors at the Starlight Stalls are now open for business!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SYSTEM_000_186<tab>You can speak to the saturnine Starlight celebrant at the Starlight Stalls if you wish to help serve more kinderpunsch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SYSTEM_000_187<tab>In so doing, you may well encounter some familiar faces!
